rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Serves as an inviting space integrating Vastu principles by orienting towards the north-east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open area with minimalistic design and natural lighting, oriented to enhance energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for easy access, designed to promote social interaction while adhering to Vastu alignments.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Functional guest space with a private ensuite, placed in accordance with Vastu for health and well-being.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom on the ground floor, with integrated bathroom ensuring privacy; designed per Vastu for balance.

openings.description: Large windows in living and dining areas to invite ample natural light, aligned with Vastu guidelines.

additional_features.description: A modern, compact terrace offering outdoor living space and scenic views, designed to maximize utility in a limited budget.
